title: Crit based marksmen late game... I don't get it
body:
If their damage got cut early, then its going to be cut later. So what would be the reason to play them for the so-called "_late game_" we barely see?
You could play {{champion:110}},  {{champion:145}},  and {{champion:96}} do way more daamge than crit based marksmen through out the entire game. 

Plus this thing {{item:3031}} is shit for the costing price.

replies.body: crit adcs might as well be deleted at this point. games are going to get shorter and shorter to appease the fortnite kiddies until the game dies.
which is why no one plays them.
IKR and riot are going to buff their abilities like that's really going to help.
